long_description: The Osprey Poco raincover works in conjunction with the Poco Sunshade (sold separately) to help protect little riders from the elements when riding in your Poco child carrier (sold separately). Poco raincover is made of high-visibility, 70-denier ripstop nylon with clear urethane side windows and a reflective logo.
short_description: The Osprey Poco raincover works in conjunction with the Poco Sunshade (sold separately) to help protect little riders from the elements when riding in your Poco child carrier (sold separately).
